text: Window type (curtain wall, storefront, punched) matches approved shop drawings & architectural intent
Frames, glass, gaskets, fasteners, anchors, and sealants match submittals
Frames inspected for damage, deformation, or finish issues prior to install
Rough openings sized and framed as per tolerance; shims & blocking provided
Air barrier/vapor barrier transitions coordinated at perimeter
Mock-up or first install verified (if required)
Frames installed level, plumb, square, shimmed, and anchored as per engineered detail
Thermal breaks (if required) continuous and undamaged
Head, jamb, sill clips and mullions installed tight with no misalignment
Glass type (low-E, tempered, laminated, IGU) matches approved glazing schedule
Glazing blocks placed and pressure plates torqued to spec
Setting blocks and edge clearances provided as per system requirement
No scratches, distortions, or blemishes on glass
All perimeter caulking sealed continuously with no voids, cold joints
Transition to WRB/AVB sealed with membrane/tape per detail
Sill pans or drip edges installed as per spec
Water and air infiltration tested (ASTM E1105 / E783) if required
Punch list completed; operation, locks, and finishes inspected
Warranty and as-built glazing submittals provided
